definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
patent/sth uniquely enjoyed (or possessed etc) by a certain group of people/monopoly
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
to focus/to concentrate/to give one's full attention

sentences.english: It’s a whole new area, especially for the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个新区，专为奥运会准备的。

sentences.english: Brillo foldable toothbrushes are designed for frequent travelers.
sentences.chinese: Brillo可折叠式牙刷专为经常旅行的人设计。

sentences.english: We tailor-made a machine specially for their requirements.
sentences.chinese: 专为满足他们的要求，我们精心设计了一台机器。

sentences.english: Cool mug designed for people that love dipping cookies in milk.
sentences.chinese: 专为那些喜欢饼干泡牛奶的人设计的超酷杯子。

sentences.english: The company set up the first online dating web site designed specifically for multimillionaires.
sentences.chinese: 该公司建立了首个专为富豪设计的在线约会网站。

sentences.english: Lack of specificity for an assay for release may be compensated for by impurities testing.
sentences.chinese: 缺少专属性数据时可用杂质测试的数据来补偿。

sentences.english: Check out this chat set up specifically for discussion of the Iran election and aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 点击这里查看专为伊朗大选及其余波而准备的聊天室。

sentences.english: The vehicle is heavy-duty base chassis comes from Cadillac designed for coach building.
sentences.chinese: 车辆重型基地底盘来自卡迪拉克专为教练的建筑物。

sentences.english: I began trying to isolate these cancer-specific antigens.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我开始尝试分离这些专属于癌症的抗原。

sentences.english: Submit assessment report or certification for propriety made fire damper installation method.
sentences.chinese: 递交评定报告或证书关于专利厂防火闸的安装方法。

sentences.english: The international architecture designed to deal with such circumstances is creaking.
sentences.chinese: 专为应对此类情况而设计的国际架构摇摇欲坠。

sentences.english: It is designed for science and non-science majors.
sentences.chinese: 课程专为科学和非科学专业所设计。

sentences.english: Ring is a special alaram clock designed for couples and deaf people.
sentences.chinese: Ring是一款特殊的闹钟，专为情侣与聋人所设计。

sentences.english: Wu Shanzhuan's work is concerned with the elimination of institutional and ideological restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 吴山专的作品关注的是制度和意识形态束缚的解除。

sentences.english: Videostudio is a set of specially designed for personal and family film editing software.
sentences.chinese: 会声会影是一套专为个人及家庭设计的影片剪辑软件。

sentences.english: Host specialization of strains is present in one geographical locality .
sentences.chinese: 在某一地理场所菌系具有寄生主的专化性。

definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
